summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2015 CAN-AM ORV (NA). WHILE THE VEHICLE WAS IN MOTION, THERE WAS A LOUD ABNORMAL NOISE, SMOKE, AND THEN A FIRE ERUPTED. A FIRE INSPECTOR EXTINGUISHED THE FLAME. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED BY THE INSURANCE COMPANY FOR FURTHER INSPECTION. THE VEHICLE WAS DESTROYED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT DIAGNOSED OR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT NOTIFIED. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS NOT AVAILABLE.
